addBasicAuthQpItem.addCredentials.qpDeta: Add username and password for basic authentication
loginQpItem.login.qpDetail: Log in to obtain a new token value
logoutQpItem.logout.qpDetail: Log out to invalidate and remove stored token value
qpPlaceholders.qp.basic: Profile is using basic authentication. Choose a profile action.
